languages.text: "Что? Что это за вопрос такой? Я не придаю особого значения таким тривиальным вещам... красный? Да, наверное, пусть будет красный".

traits.locale_text: "Что? Что это за вопрос такой? Я не придаю особого значения таким тривиальным вещам... красный? Да, наверное, пусть будет красный".

languages.text: "What? What kind of a question is that? I don't place any importance on such trivial things... Red? Yes, I suppose my favourite colour would be red."
languages.original_text: "Что? Что это за вопрос такой? Я не придаю особого значения таким тривиальным вещам... красный? Да, наверное, пусть будет красный".

traits.locale_text: "What? What kind of a question is that? I don't place any importance on such trivial things... Red? Yes, I suppose my favourite colour would be red."
"What? What kind of a question is that? I don't place any importance on such trivial things... Red? Yes, I suppose my favourite colour would be red."
"What? What kind of a question is that? I don't place any importance on such trivial things... Red? Yes, I suppose my favourite colour would be red."
"What? What kind of a question is that? I don't place any importance on such trivial things... Red? Yes, I suppose my favourite colour would be red."

languages.text: “什么？这算是哪门子的问题？我并不在乎这些琐事……或许是红色？是啊，我猜我最喜欢的颜色应该是红色。”
languages.original_text: "What? What kind of a question is that? I don't place any importance on such trivial things... Red? Yes, I suppose my favourite colour would be red."

traits.locale_text: “什么？这算是哪门子的问题？我并不在乎这些琐事……或许是红色？是啊，我猜我最喜欢的颜色应该是红色。”

languages.text: «¿Cómo? ¿Pero qué clase de pregunta es esa? No dedico tiempo a pensar en cosas tan triviales... ¿El rojo? Sí, supongo que sería el rojo».
languages.original_text: "What? What kind of a question is that? I don't place any importance on such trivial things... Red? Yes, I suppose my favourite colour would be red."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo? ¿Pero qué clase de pregunta es esa? No dedico tiempo a pensar en cosas tan triviales... ¿El rojo? Sí, supongo que sería el rojo».

languages.text: 「ん？なんでそんなことを聞くんだ？大して気にしたこともないが…赤かな。そうだ、好きな色は赤だ」
languages.original_text: "What? What kind of a question is that? I don't place any importance on such trivial things... Red? Yes, I suppose my favourite colour would be red."

traits.locale_text: 「ん？なんでそんなことを聞くんだ？大して気にしたこともないが…赤かな。そうだ、好きな色は赤だ」

languages.text: « Quoi ? Mais qu'est-ce que c'est que cette question ? Ce genre de trivialités n'a aucune importance à mes yeux... Le rouge ? Oui, si je devais avoir une couleur préférée, ce serait le rouge. »
languages.original_text: "What? What kind of a question is that? I don't place any importance on such trivial things... Red? Yes, I suppose my favourite colour would be red."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? Mais qu'est-ce que c'est que cette question ? Ce genre de trivialités n'a aucune importance à mes yeux... Le rouge ? Oui, si je devais avoir une couleur préférée, ce serait le rouge. »

languages.text: "Was? Was ist das denn für eine Frage? Triviale Sachen wie Essen haben keinen Wert für mich ... Rot? Ja, Rot ist wohl meine Lieblingsfarbe."
languages.original_text: "What? What kind of a question is that? I don't place any importance on such trivial things... Red? Yes, I suppose my favourite colour would be red."

traits.locale_text: "Was? Was ist das denn für eine Frage? Triviale Sachen wie Essen haben keinen Wert für mich ... Rot? Ja, Rot ist wohl meine Lieblingsfarbe."

languages.text: "Ne? Bu nasıl bir soru? Böylesi sıradan şeylere önem göstermem ben... Kırmızı? Evet, sanırım en sevdiğim renk kırmızı olabilir."
languages.original_text: "What? What kind of a question is that? I don't place any importance on such trivial things... Red? Yes, I suppose my favourite colour would be red."
